scripts.serve:dist: npm run make:dist && npx http-server dist --port ${PORT} --cors -c-1
scripts.serve:pages: npm run make:pages && npx http-server pages --port ${PORT} --cors -c-1
scripts.start: npx concurrently -n 'watch:src  ,serve:dist ,serve:pages' 'npm run watch:src' 'PORT=${PORT_DIST:-3001} npm run serve:dist' 'PORT=${PORT_DIST:-3000} npm run serve:pages'
